verses.verse: On that <S%H3117>day<s%> did the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>' <S%H6887>enemy<s%> unto <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%>. And <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>; for <S%H635>Esther<s%> had told what he was unto <S%H5046>her<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> took <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H2885>ring<s%>, which he had <S%H5674>taken<s%> from <S%H2001>Haman<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>. And <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%>.

And <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H2603>besought<s%> him with <S%H1058>tears<s%> to put <S%H5674>away<s%> the <S%H7451>mischief<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite<s%>, and his <S%H4284>device<s%> that he had <S%H2803>devised<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> held <S%H3447>out<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>sceptre<s%>. So <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, If it <S%H2896>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> seem <S%H3787>right<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and I be <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, let it be <S%H3789>written<s%> to <S%H7725>reverse<s%> the <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H4284>devised<s%> by <S%H2001>Haman<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite<s%>, which he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that are in all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces<s%>:

for <S%H349>how<s%> can I <S%H3201>endure<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that shall <S%H4672>come<s%> unto my <S%H5971>people<s%>? or <S%H349>how<s%> can I <S%H3201>endure<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H13>destruction<s%> of my <S%H4138>kindred<s%>?

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> and to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I have given <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%>, and him they have <S%H8518>hanged<s%> upon the <S%H6086>gallows<s%>, because he <S%H7971>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>.

Write <S%H3789><s%> ye also to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, as it <S%H2896>pleaseth<s%> <S%H5869>you<s%>, in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H2856>seal<s%> it with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring<s%>; for the <S%H3791>writing<s%> which is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring<s%>, may no man <S%H7725>reverse<s%>.

Then were the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribes<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5510>Sivan<s%>, on the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day <S%H3789>thereof<s%>; and it was written according to all that <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> unto the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, and to the <S%H323>satraps<s%>, and the <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> which are from <S%H1912>India<s%> unto <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4082>provinces<s%>, unto every <S%H4082>province<s%> according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> <S%H5971>thereof<s%>, and unto every people after their <S%H3956>language<s%>, and to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> according to their <S%H3791>writing<s%>, and according to their <S%H3956>language<s%>.

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> it with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H7323>post<s%> on <S%H5483>horseback<s%>, <S%H7392>riding<s%> on swift <S%H7409>steeds<s%> that were used in the <S%H327>king<s%>'s service, <S%H1121>bred<s%> of the <S%H7424>stud<s%>:

wherein the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>granted<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in every <S%H5892>city<s%> to gather themselves <S%H6950>together<s%>, and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> for their <S%H5315>life<s%>, to <S%H8045>destroy<s%>, to <S%H2026>slay<s%>, and to cause to <S%H6>perish<s%>, all the <S%H2428>power<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H4082>province<s%> that would <S%H6696>assault<s%> <S%H2945>them<s%>, their little ones and <S%H802>women<s%>, and to take the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of them for a <S%H962>prey<s%>,

upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, <S%H7969>namely<s%>, upon the thirteenth day of the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%>.

A <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>writing<s%>, that the <S%H1881>decree<s%> should be <S%H5414>given<s%> out in every <S%H4082>province<s%>, was <S%H1540>published<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and that the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> should be <S%H6264>ready<s%> against that <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H5358>avenge<s%> themselves on their <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

So the <S%H7323>posts<s%> that <S%H7392>rode<s%> upon swift <S%H7409>steeds<s%> that were used in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s service went <S%H3318>out<s%>, being <S%H926>hastened<s%> and pressed <S%H1765>on<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>commandment<s%>; and the <S%H1881>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%>.

And <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3830>apparel<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H2353>white<s%>, and with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and with a <S%H8509>robe<s%> of fine <S%H948>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%>: and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> <S%H6670>shouted<s%> and was <S%H8056>glad<s%>.

And in every <S%H4082>province<s%>, and in every <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H4725>whithersoever<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1881>decree<s%> <S%H5060>came<s%>, the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> had <S%H8342>gladness<s%> and <S%H8057>joy<s%>, a <S%H4960>feast<s%> and a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>. And <S%H7227>many<s%> from among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> became <S%H3054>Jews<s%>; for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> was fallen upon <S%H5307>them<s%>.
